entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
